examples.name: High-Frequency Financial Trading Platform
examples.description: Real-time cryptocurrency and stock trading platform with ultra-low latency requirements

data.projectDescription: Build a real-time financial trading platform for cryptocurrency and stock trading. The platform needs to handle high-frequency trading, real-time market data, order matching, portfolio management, and risk assessment. Users should be able to execute trades instantly with minimal latency.

qualityGoals.responseTime: < 10ms for trade execution, < 50ms for market data
qualityGoals.dataVolume: Real-time market data streams (500GB/day), 1TB user portfolio data

technicalRules.teamSkills: High-frequency trading, low-latency systems, quantitative analysis
technicalRules.integrations: Market data feeds (Bloomberg, Reuters), banking APIs, regulatory reporting systems
technicalRules.regulations: SEC regulations, MiFID II, KYC/AML compliance, CFTC rules

additionalInfo.additionalRequirements: Co-location in data centers near exchanges, algorithmic trading support, advanced charting tools, mobile trading app, risk management algorithms

examples.name: Multi-Vendor E-commerce Platform
examples.description: Scalable e-commerce platform with multiple vendor support and global reach

data.projectDescription: Build a modern e-commerce platform for selling electronics and gadgets. The platform should support multiple vendors, real-time inventory management, payment processing, order tracking, and customer reviews. Users should be able to browse products, compare prices, add items to wishlist, and checkout seamlessly.

qualityGoals.responseTime: < 200ms for page loads, < 500ms for API calls
qualityGoals.dataVolume: 50GB product catalog, 100GB user data, 500GB transaction logs
qualityGoals.growthRate: 200% user growth expected in next 2 years
qualityGoals.authNeeds: Multi-factor authentication, OAuth integration, role-based access
qualityGoals.accessibilityNeeds: WCAG 2.1 AA compliance, screen reader support

technicalRules.integrations: Payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal), Shipping APIs (FedEx, UPS), Email service (SendGrid), Analytics (Google Analytics)
technicalRules.regulations: PCI DSS compliance, GDPR compliance, SOX compliance

additionalInfo.additionalRequirements: Need mobile app support, real-time notifications, advanced search with filters, recommendation engine, multi-language support (5 languages), vendor dashboard for inventory management

examples.name: Hospital Healthcare Management System
examples.description: Critical healthcare management system for hospital networks with strict compliance requirements

data.projectDescription: Develop a comprehensive healthcare management system for a hospital network. The system should manage patient records, appointment scheduling, doctor availability, medical billing, prescription management, and lab results. It needs to integrate with existing hospital equipment and maintain strict data privacy.

qualityGoals.responseTime: < 100ms for critical operations, < 300ms for general queries
qualityGoals.dataVolume: 10TB patient records, 5TB medical imaging, 2TB billing data
qualityGoals.disasterRecovery: RTO: 30 minutes, RPO: 5 minutes, hot standby required
qualityGoals.authNeeds: Biometric authentication, smart card access, audit trails
qualityGoals.accessibilityNeeds: ADA compliance, voice commands for surgeons

technicalRules.teamSkills: Enterprise Java, Healthcare IT, Database administration, Security
technicalRules.integrations: HL7 interfaces, medical devices (MRI, CT scanners), pharmacy systems, insurance APIs, lab equipment
technicalRules.regulations: HIPAA compliance, FDA regulations, Joint Commission standards

additionalInfo.additionalRequirements: Integration with medical IoT devices, telemedicine capabilities, AI-powered diagnosis assistance, automated backup to multiple locations, 24/7 monitoring and alerts

examples.name: Simple Blog Platform
examples.description: Minimal blog platform with basic features - represents minimal data input scenario

data.projectDescription: Create a simple blog platform where users can write, publish, and share articles. Features include user registration, article creation with rich text editor, comments, tags, and basic analytics.

requestStructure.projectDescription: string - REQUIRED - Core description of what to build

qualityGoals.expectedUsers: number - DEFAULT: 1 - Index 0-3 representing scale tiers
qualityGoals.dataVolume: string - OPTIONAL - Storage and data processing requirements

additionalInfo.additionalRequirements: string - OPTIONAL - Any other special requirements

securityMeasures.reasoning: Why this security measure is needed
